price: Faraoni i ndoqi ata (bijtë e Israilit) me ushtrinë e tij, por deti i mbuloi ata me dallgë të mëdha.
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
